heroSection.heroDescription: Browse and copy hundreds of investment strategies developed by master traders! Whether you are a pro or beginner, you can now trade quicker and more confidently.
heroSection.disclaimer: When you invest, your capital is at risk. Be prudent.

fastMatching.title: Fast Matching
fastMatching.description: Zero in on your ideal Master effortlessly. Sort by performance and drawdown levels or discover opportunities from new signals with our smart filters. Still can’t decide? Simply head over to Spotlight for quality signals curated by us.

analysis.title: Easy Analysis
analysis.description: Instant clarity on the Masters’ profile. Get a snapshot of their trade history, profitability, risk, and portfolio all in one place.

tradeSteps.title: Trade Like a Pro in Minutes
steps: Choose a signal Master and click “Copy”

mt4Slider.title: How to Link MT4 Account
slides: Login OR create a new account
Fill in your Blackwell Global trading account OR create a new account

benefits.title: Regulated
benefits.description: The copy trading platform is regulated. Our technology partner is regulated. And so are we, as a brokerage. We operate under strict compliance for your peace of mind.

benefits.title: 0 Commissions
benefits.description: When investing, the small margins matter. Blackwell Invest offers 0 commissions investing, and 0 cost to install our app.

benefits.title: User friendly
benefits.description: With an intuitive interface, easy trade execution, and hassle-free management, copying top traders has never been simpler. Trade smarter, not harder!

benefits.title: Tier 1 liquidity
benefits.description: Blackwell Invest sources the best liquidity to provide a deep product range and broad market access. Fast order execution and transparent pricing.

items.title: Discover
items.description: Explore all the investment Masters available on Blackwell Invest. Dive into their profiles and analyse their profitability at a glance.

items.title: Activity
items.description: See the past trades made by the signals you are copying from the last 30 days or track their open positions. Monitor their strategy, and make informed decisions with timely updates of the trades shaping your portfolio.

items.title: Trade
items.description: Seamlessly trade oil CFDs, indices, and currency pairs with ease.

items.title: Positions
items.description: Easily track the status of all your trades and monitor your account metrics in real-time.

items.title: Account
items.description: Access detailed information about your trading account, monitor copier drawdown levels, assess your profitability, and keep track of your trade performance – all in one place!
